# Commandline Docs

## How to

- [Parse and invoke the result](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/how-to-parse-and-invoke.md): Learn how to get parsed values and define actions for your commands.
- [Customize parsing and validation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/how-to-customize-parsing-and-validation.md): Learn how to customize parsing and validation with the System.CommandLine library.
- [Configure the parser](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/how-to-configure-the-parser.md): Learn how to configure the parser in System.CommandLine.
- [Enable and customize tab completion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/how-to-enable-tab-completion.md): How to enable and customize tab completion for apps built on the System.CommandLine library.
- [Customize help](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/how-to-customize-help.md): Learn how to use and customize help in apps that are built with the System.Commandline library.

## System.CommandLine

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/index.md): Learn how to develop and use command-line apps that are based on the System.CommandLine library.
- [Get started tutorial](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/get-started-tutorial.md): Learn how to use the System.CommandLine library for command-line apps.
- [Command-line syntax overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/syntax.md): An introduction to the command-line syntax that the System.CommandLine library recognizes by default. Shows how to define commands, options, and arguments.
- [Design guidance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/design-guidance.md): Provides guidance for designing a command-line interface.
- [Migration guide to 2.0.0-beta5](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/commandline/migration-guide-2.0.0-beta5.md): Learn about how to migrate to System.CommandLine 2.0.0-beta5+.
